title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction; Mathematical models of physical system; Feedback characteristics of control systems; Control systems and components; Time response analysis, design specifications and performance indices; Concepts of stability and algebraic criteria; Root locus technique; Frequency response analysis; Stability in frequency domain; Introduction to design; State variable analysis and design.
